name: graphlib
description: RDD about a graph library for JavaScript.

scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Updating docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Updating docs' && git push git@github.com:medialab/graphlib gh-pages --force

author: yomguithereal <kropotkinepiotr@gmail.com>
